jaca.android.dev
Class SensorManagerArtifact

java.lang.Object
  cartago.Artifact
      jaca.android.dev.JaCaArtifact
          jaca.android.dev.SensorManagerArtifact
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccelerometerSensorManager, AllSensorsManager, GeomagneticSensorManager, MySensorsArtifact, OrientationSensorManager
public abstract class SensorManagerArtifact
extends JaCaArtifact

Base artifact used for managing the device sensors. This can be seen as an "abstract" artifact. Developers must extends this class for defining their own artifacts able to manage sensors events. This class provides the name of all the possible observable properties related to sensors.

#### Observable Properties #####

  • is_monitoring(Value). Value = {true, false}

Author:
asanti

Field Detail

SENSOR_ACCELEROMETER

public static java.lang.String SENSOR_ACCELEROMETER
Name of the observable property holding the value of the accelerometer. This observable property is meant to be defined, whit this name, by each artifact that manage the accelerometer (extending the SensorManagerArtifact)

SENSOR_GEOMAG

public static java.lang.String SENSOR_GEOMAG
Name of the observable property holding the value of the geomagnetic sensor. This observable property is meant to be defined, whit this name, by each artifact that manage the geomagnetic sensor (extending the SensorManagerArtifact)

public static java.lang.String SENSOR_ORIENTATION
Name of the observable property holding the value of the orientation sensor. This observable property is meant to be defined, whit this name, by each artifact that manage the orientation sensor (extending the SensorManagerArtifact)

init

public void init(java.lang.Integer delay,
                 java.lang.Integer... sensorsTypes)
          throws java.lang.Exception
Parameters:
delay - The desired sensor delay must be one of SensorManager.SENSOR_DELAY_*
sensorsTypes - The list of sensors to monitor whit this artifact (a set of Sensor.TYPE_*)
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getEvToOpLinks

public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getEvToOpLinks()
Return the HashMap mapping sensors events to the artifacts operations responsible of their management

onSensorChanged

public abstract void onSensorChanged(SensorEvent event)
Default internal operation called (once linked by linkEventToOp(Integer, String, String) by the fetchSensorsEvents() for handling the sensor event indicating changes in the sensor value

Parameters:
event -

onAccuracyChanged

public abstract void onAccuracyChanged(Sensor arg0,
                                       int arg1)
Default internal operation called (once linked by linkEventToOp(Integer, String, String) by the fetchSensorsEvents() for handling the sensor event indicating changes in the sensor accuracy
